```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(dbplyr)
library(readxl)



reablilitet <- read_excel("data/realabilitet uttrekning.xlsx")
View(realabilitet_uttrekning)

reablilitet %>%
  mutate(diff = `VO2_max_ml/min post` - `VO2_max_ml/min pre`) %>% # Change/difference score
  summarise(s = round(sd(diff), 1),  # Summarize to calculate sd, and... 
            m = mean(c(`VO2_max_ml/min post`, `VO2_max_ml/min pre`)), # mean
            te = round(s / sqrt(2), 1), # the typical error. 
            cv = round(100 * (te / m), 1), # 
             L = qt(0.975, 4) * s) %>% # Calculate as a percentage of the mean
  # Round is used to get less decimal places..
  print()
```
